name: INARI (bentocat)
description:
INARI is a 2D hack-and-slash platformer created as a capstone project by game development students at Columbia College Chicago.

---

Concept:

Take control of Inari, a ninja kitsune who has descended from the heavens to slay the evil spirits plaguing Japan. Slash your way through demons as you run across rooftops, through crowded festival streets, and make your way to the leader of the demonic parade.

---

Controls:

Keyboard: Arrow keys - Move, Space - Jump, Attack - Z, Dash - Shift

Controller: Left stick - Move, A - Jump, Attack - X, Dash - Left Trigger

---

Credits:

---

This is a very early version of our game that has basic features of the game's experience. Please let us know if you have any feedback!
